## Checklist
`choose one minimum` <!--ALWAYS create or update a test when POSSIBLE-->
- [ ] created unit test
- [ ] updated unit test
- [ ] created UI test
- [ ] updated UI test
- [ ] bug fix/other

`required`
- [ ] tested locally
- [ ] [updated the docs](https://github.com/DevGauge/FileEngineKit/blob/master/.github/documentation_standards.md)
- [ ] ALL unit tests pass

`optional`
- [ ] added new dependencies
